Lamide Akintobi (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 19) bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụkọ na Channels TV na dị ka onye na-akwado ma na-emepụta ihe ngosi a na-akpọ The Spot na EbonyLife TV ya na Zainab Balogun na Ebuka Obi-Uchendu ruo mgbe emechara ihe ngosi ahụ n'etiti afọ 2017.
Akintobi amụrụ na Legos, Nigeria bụ onye Abeokuta, Ogun Steeti
O nwetara nzere nka na Broadcast Journalism na Spanish site na Volunteer State Community College na Tennessee na nzere bachelọ na ngalaba ọmụmụ ndị a kpọtụrụ aha na Texas A&M University–Commerce
O nwetakwara nzere masta na International Journalism na City University na London dị ka British Council Chevening Scholar na afo 2011
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Delta Sigma Theta sorority na afo 2004
O biri oge ụfọdụ na Tennessee na Texas.
Akintobi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi na Channels TV. Ya na Zainab Balogun na Ebuka Obi-Uchendu kwadoro ihe ngosi a na-akpọ The Spot na EbonyLife TV, ma mepụta ma gosipụta usoro El Now

EbonyLife TV bụ ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn ojii mbụ nke Africa na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi n'ụwa niile, nke a na-agbasa na mba iri anọ. Lamide bụ onye na-emepụta ihe n'onwe ya ugbu a, onye na-eme ihe ngosi na onye na-ahụ maka ihe omume nke ọrụ ya pụtara na CNN Style feature.

N'afọ 2015, edepụtara Akintobi dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri ise na-agbanwe ọrụ nta akụkọ na Naịjirịa site n'aka umunwanyi na oru nta akuko na Naijiria nakwa dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị otu narị kachasị akpali akpali na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2019 site n'aka Leading Ladies Afrika
Akintobi bụ nwa nwanyị onye egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria bụ Laolu Akins
